reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome value for the money!
reviews.reviewText: Heads up - the description is not accurate - in addition to the top you also get a matching pair of shorts with this purchase! Not sure why they don't tell you that! For under 20 bucks, this is a steal. Appears well made and breathable. This is mostly summer/spring wear, so currently not the right weather to try it on. But overall, it looks good, feels soft and fits true to size. You can wear the top by itself or wear this as a set. It'll work either way. Would def. recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pretty Sweater!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the blue and it is so pretty! It's a soft baby blue. I saw in the product page pictures that the design had lots of small holes so I went one size up so it wouldn't be clingy. It wasn't necessary. The sweater has lots of stretch and the knitted holes are small enough so nothing is revealed (though I would suggest wearing a skin tone bra so the color of the bra won't show. Unexpected but happily there was a matching pair of knit shorts in the same pretty baby blue. I'll have to wait until Spring to wear them. I would call this "true to size". Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the sweater! Both the style and color look exactly as pictured. I ordered it in the light blue and it’s beautiful. It’s lightweight and perfect for the spring or summer. It has a loose fit and looks better worn out instead of tucked in. The sweater can be worn casually with jeans or shorts, but it can also be worn with trousers or a skirt for business casual. It is such a versatile top to have in my wardrobe. It’s of great quality, very soft and comfortable. Although I only ordered the sweater, I also got a pair of matching shorts. The shorts look more like pajamas and I’m not sure why they were included but I guess it was a bonus item. The V-neck is great, and not too low-cut. I know I’ll get a lot of use out of this sweater in the warmer weather. I would definitely recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a nice quality, but was not flattering on my plus size body. The cuffs of the sleeves and at the bottom seemed to cling a bit on me, so it wasn't a true boxy fit. The light blue color is as pictured and is very pretty. The material is super soft and breathable. This would be great for loungewear or dressing up for date night!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this top. It is a perfect white blouse for any type of day. You can easily dress this blouse up or down depending on your outfit. The design gives it a cute look. I am a teacher so I love for these white blouses that just go with everything. It is perfectly made and has withstood many washes. It is true to size however I ordered a size up and I am glad I did. It is very comfy and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this. The material is great and can be worn with pretty much anything. It's not advertised but it also came with a pair of drawstring shorts that coordinate with the top - same material. The top is short sleeve and would be great with shorts, dress slacks, business slacks, or even a business suit. It's super versatile and it is a good fit. The price is great for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how soft the material is and the webbing allows for airflow without the top being see through. The shorts have a tie waistband, which makes it handy since I carry so much weight in the middle of my body. I ordered my regular size and it was perfect. The light blue color is beautiful and I can separate the pair to wear with jeans or at bedtime, too. I love how versatile this set is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The color of this shirt is really pretty. My issue with it is I am a true size medium and this was a bit big on me and hung too low. I'll keep it but probably won't be wearing it much.
